Qrs Press Demo

Dom

Dom DOMDOM/ComponentVNode

DOM

  • constructor(selector)HTMLElementDom
  • find(selector)Dom
  • findAll(selector)Dom

// 
const container = new Dom('#app');
// 
const title = container.find('.title');
// 
const listItems = container.findAll('.list-item');

CSS

  • css(styles){ color: 'red', fontSize: '16px' }
  • hasClass(className)/addClass(className)/removeClass(className)/toggleClass(className)

// 
title.css({ backgroundColor: '#f0f0f0' }).addClass('highlight');

HTMLdata-*

  • attr(name, [value])/attr('data-id', '123')
  • data(key, [value])JSONdata-*

// 
title.data('user', { name: '', age: 25 });
// 
const user = title.data('user'); // { name: '', age: 25 }

  • on(event, [selector], handler)
    • selectoron('click', handleClick)
    • selectoron('click', '.btn', handleBtnClick)
  • off(event, [handler])

// 
container.on('click', '.list-item', (e) => {
  console.log('', e.target.textContent);
});

DOM

DOM

  • append(child)/prepend(child)/DomHTMLElement
  • before(newNode)/after(newNode)
  • remove()/empty()/

// 
const newItem = new Dom(document.createElement('li'));
newItem.html('').addClass('list-item');
container.append(newItem);

  • transition(properties, duration, easing)CSStransition
  • animate(properties, duration, easing, complete)

// 01500ms
newItem.animate({ opacity: 1 }, 500, 'ease-in', () => {
  console.log('');
});

/

DomComponentVNode

  • toComponent()Domrender
  • toVNode()Dom
  • static fromVNode(vnode)Dom

Dom

// DOM
const domComponent = new Dom('#existing-element').toComponent();
// 
new ParentComponent().render().append(domComponent.render());

  • thisdom.css().addClass().append()
  • isVisible()
  • _animationQueuestop(clearQueue)
